name: TimeKeepers (itch) (Ben James)
description:
The evil Dr. Lunacy has stolen the zoo animals and scattered them throughout time! You are a zoo-keeper with a taste for adventure - you must rescue the animals and restore the timeline!

  • Pixel platforming action
  • Jump, dash and stomp!
  • 6 hazard-filled time zones
  • New characters to unlock
  • Secrets to uncover
  • 18 trophies to collect
  • Easy, normal and hard modes

Follow me on Twitter
